listitem.para: Whether to use IKEv1 (RFC 4301) or IKEv2 (RFC 7296). Currently the accepted values are no, signifying only IKEv1 is accepted, or yes (the default), signifying only IKEv2 is accepted. Previous versions allowed the keywords propose or permit that would allow either IKEv1 or IKEv2, but this is no longer supported. The permit option is interpreted as no and the propose option is interpreted as yes. Older versions also supported keyword insist which is now interpreted as yes.
